gameDetails.name: Good Cop Bad Cop: Undercover â€“ Smuggler Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
Originally included in the Dice Tower Season 12 (2016) Kickstarter Campaign.

It is also contained in Good Cop Bad Cop Equipment Pack: Tower (which was also included in Dice Tower Season 12 Kickstarter)

The smuggler is a new undercover assignment card

Purple Side: When you take the equip action, you do not have to reveal an integrity card

Red Side: Choose another player. That player picks up all of their integrity cards and places them face down in any arrangement

Also included in the 2024 Equipment Pack 3 as part of Good Cop Bad Cop 4th edition kickstarter.
